content.rendered:
What’s in it for you?

Why Choose Optika?

At Optika, we’re more than just an optician – we’re part of the Weston-super-Mare community. This is a fantastic opportunity for an optometrist to make a real impact, develop professionally, and be part of a caring and close-knit team.

Ready to begin your journey with us? Apply today and start your career with a practice that puts patients at the heart of everything we do!

You will also receive:

  • Your birthday off work
  • Welcome bonus of £5000
  • No Sunday or bank holiday working
  • Free & regular CPD courses
  • Access to Simply Health (claim cashback on healthcare purchases)
  • Retail discounts
  • Cycle to work scheme

About the Role

Optometrist – Full-time or Part-time (3 days a week) Opportunity in Weston-super-Mare!

Optika Opticians is excited to offer an opportunity for a passionate individual to join our supportive and friendly team in Weston-super-Mare, where patient care is always our priority.

As a key member of our practice, you’ll have the chance to grow and develop your skills while delivering high-quality care. We take pride in getting to know our patients and providing personalised, empathetic consultations that make a real difference in their lives.

Why Start Your Career in Weston-super-Mare?

Nestled on the beautiful Somerset coast, Weston-super-Mare offers the perfect blend of coastal charm and modern living, making it an excellent place to begin your career.

  • Great Transport Links: Just 30 minutes from Bristol by train and easily accessible via the M5, commuting is a breeze.
  • Vibrant Lifestyle: Enjoy the town’s mix of shops, cafes, and restaurants, or relax with coastal walks and local events that add to the town’s lively cultural scene.
  • Affordable Living: With more affordable housing options, you can enjoy a comfortable work-life balance.

What You’ll Do:

  • Conduct comprehensive eye exams with ample time to give each patient your full attention (35-40 minute).
  • Work with modern, advanced equipment like the slit lamp, keratometer, Icare, Henson 9000, and Topcon Maestro.
  • Collaborate with our experienced team of 9, including an experienced dispensing optician, in our well-equipped consulting rooms and pre-screen area.
  • Educate and engage with patients on the importance of eye health as a key ambassador for our community practice.
  • Enjoy flexible work arrangements, with the opportunity to work 2 out of 4 Saturdays per month.

What We’re Looking For:

  • An Optometrist with a passion for delivering high-quality care.
  • A patient-focused approach with a friendly, empathetic manner.
  • A willingness to learn and grow within a supportive team.
  • A team player who thrives in a local, independent practice setting
  • We are committed to supporting newly qualified optometrists in launching their careers and achieving professional growth with us.

What’s Next?

Click apply below and we will ensure you are contacted as soon as possible by one of our team.

Salary – Max

GBP £60,000.00

Salary – Min

GBP £48,000.00

What’s in it for you?

This is an opportunity for you to make a difference in patients’ lives.

You didn’t become an Optometrist to sell glasses…

As an independent practice, we can provide you with the clinical freedom, time, and equipment to solve problems and genuinely help people.

Our patient’s are loyal to us, returning year after year, meaning you’ll have the opportunity to see real continuity of care too.

We believe working with us will allow you to escape hollow targets whilst providing you with a platform to have your voice heard in practice.

You will also receive:

  • Your birthday off work
  • No Sunday or bank holiday working
  • Free & regular CPD courses
  • Access to Simply Health (claim cashback on healthcare purchases)
  • Retail discounts
  • Cycle to work scheme

About the Role

We’re looking for a part-time Optometrist to join us in delivering outstanding patient care.

You’ll be an integral part of our team here and will help us drive our service offering forward, always looking for opportunities to improve and innovate.

We’re also looking for someone who shares our dedication to putting patients first and spending the time needed to get to the bottom of their visual needs.

Just as important to us is the way you interact with patients. Providing a friendly, informative, and empathetic service is a must.

Ultimately, you must be an ambassador for our brand and profession within the local community.

Educating others about the benefits of eye care is an ongoing challenge and one that we look forward to meeting head-on with you as a part of our team.

About Us

We are a committed independent practice, dedicated to providing our patients with high-quality care and an exceptional experience in practice.

Additional Information:

  • Our test times are 30-40 minutes
  • We have 1 consulting rooms
  • Our testing equipment includes OCT
  • We are a team of 6 across both stores
  • The role requires you to work 2 in 4 Saturdays a month.

Our local community is a part of our identity here and we constantly see the benefits our work has when we’re out and about in the area.

What’s Next?

Click apply below and we will ensure you are contacted as soon as possible by one of our team.

GBP £60,000.00

title.rendered: Joint Venture Partner – Optometrist job in Cleethorpes

content.rendered:
What’s in it for you?

Your Practice, Your Vision:

Hakim Group is a support structure designed to make your ambitions come to life. We aren’t here to dictate your business strategy we’re here to redefine what independents can achieve.

A Growing Investment:

All the practices we support are profitable and see growing returns over time. This means less risk with your money and a higher chance of increasing dividends.

The opportunity to be a Joint Venture Partner (JVP) Optometrist can be flexible to be within one or both of our established and thriving practices within North East Lincolnshire; Segals and Stephens & Drew.

Stephens & Drew Opticians have long since been a part of the Cleethorpes community, with the first practice opening in 1958. Followed by Segals Opticians in 1984, who are also now a well established independent practice, committed to innovation and providing exceptional standards of patient care.

Both practices are proud to provide quality eyecare for all the family with thorough eye examinations and personal service. Using the latest equipment (including OCT), our experienced team are highly qualified to provide individualised care and advice based on patient needs.

This is an excellent opportunity to be involved in the success and growth of two truly local independant practices.

You will also receive:

Segals and Stephens & Drew Opticians are looking for a passionate and experienced individual to work with the existing team in providing a high-quality, patient-centric service.

As a talented Optometrist, and Joint Venture Partner, stepping into leading these independent practices, you will invest in the development and progression of the team, who are passionate about their practice and are engaged in supporting its growth more than ever before.

You can expect support from Hakim group in the form of:

  • A Marketing Department
  • An HR & Payroll Department
  • A Finance Department
  • An I.T Department
  • An Operations Department
  • A Buying Team
  • A Legal Team
  • A Dedicated Practice Mentor

About the Role

Becoming a Joint Venture Partner Optometrist (JVP) is a special role within Hakim Group, and on paper, it’s quite simple:

Deliver a best-in-class service for your patients and your team members. The rest will look after itself.

Once you join the team, you will become part of a nationwide network of equally passionate and dedicated partners striving to deliver excellence.

You will lead, shape, and develop your practice team and will be free to craft a truly unique experience for your patients.

About Us

For us, this is what being a JVP Optometrist is all about:

  • Becoming a leader
  • Creating and nurturing innovation
  • Constant and never-ending improvement
  • Playing as a team
  • Communication, communication, communication

If you are enjoying yourself, learning, and your team is happy to come into work every day to deliver an exceptional patient experience – that, for us, is true success.

It’s not work if you love what you do, and it’s our job to make that happen!

What’s Next?

If you are interested in becoming a JVP with Hakim Group and being the Director of your dream practice – click apply below, and a member of our team will contact you with more information!

Salary – Max

GBP £65,000.00

Salary – Min

GBP £60,000.00

content.rendered:
What’s in it for you?

This is an opportunity for you to make a difference in patients’ lives in Battle.

You didn’t become an Optometrist to sell glasses…

As an independent practice, Barracloughs can provide you with the clinical freedom, time, and equipment to solve problems and genuinely help people.

Our patient’s are loyal to us, returning year after year, meaning you’ll have the opportunity to see real continuity of care too.

We believe working with us will allow you to escape hollow targets whilst providing you with a platform to have your voice heard in practice.

You will also receive:

  • Your birthday off work
  • No Sunday or bank holiday working
  • Free & regular CPD courses
  • Access to Simply Health (claim cashback on healthcare purchases)
  • Retail discounts
  • Cycle to work scheme
  • Attractive welcome bonus of £5000

About the Role

Barracloughs is looking for a full-time or part-time Optometrist to join us in delivering outstanding patient care in our Battle store.

You’ll be an integral part of our team here and will help us drive our service offering forward, always looking for opportunities to improve and innovate.

We’re also looking for someone who shares our dedication to putting patients first and spending the time needed to get to the bottom of their visual needs.

Just as important to us is the way you interact with patients. Providing a friendly, informative, and empathetic service is a must.

Ultimately, you must be an ambassador for our brand and profession within the local community.

Educating others about the benefits of eye care is an ongoing challenge and one that we look forward to meeting head-on with you as a part of our team.

About Us

We are a committed independent practice, dedicated to providing our patients with high-quality care and an exceptional experience in practice.

Additional Information:

  • Our test times are 30 to 40 minutes
  • We have 2 consulting rooms
  • Our testing equipment includes OCT, icare pro, testing rooms all with air conditioning
  • We are a team of 6
  • The role requires you to work 2 in 4 Saturdays a month.

Our local communities are a part of our identity here and we constantly see the benefits our work has when we’re out and about in the area.

What’s Next?

Click apply below and we will ensure you are contacted as soon as possible by one of our team.

Salary – Max

GBP £65,000.00

Salary – Min

GBP £55,000.00

title.rendered: Joint Venture Partner – Optometrist job in Leyburn

content.rendered:
What’s in it for you?

The opportunity to own and run an already well established and successful private Optical practice in North Yorkshire. Orkney Opticians is the only Opticians in Leyburn and aside from an established and fiercely loyal patient network, the practice has the benefit of being situated in one of the most idyllic locations in the country. With waterfalls a mere walk away and the Yorkshire Dales on your doorstep, this opportunity will stand out to a tenacious Optometrist looking to relocate their family to a charming countryside market town and take the next leap in their career.

The practice benefits by being part of the Hakim Group, a support structure designed to make your ambitions come to life. We aren’t here to dictate your business strategy we’re here to redefine what independents can achieve. All the practices we support are profitable and see growing returns over time, with Orkney Opticians being no different. This means less risk with your money and a higher chance of increasing dividends.

Becoming a Joint Venture Partner Optometrist (JVP) is a special role within Hakim Group, and on paper, it’s quite simple:

Deliver a best-in-class service for your patients and your team members. The rest will look after itself.

Once you join the team, you will become part of a nationwide network of equally passionate and dedicated partners striving to deliver excellence. You will lead, shape, and develop your practice team and will be free to craft a truly unique experience for your patients.

You will also receive:

As Part of the Hakim Group the practice benefits from the following

  • A Marketing Department
  • An HR & Payroll Department
  • A Finance Department
  • An I.T Department
  • An Operations Department
  • A Buying Team
  • A Recruitment Team
  • A Legal Team
  • A Dedicated Practice Mentor

And much more. All staff within HG are entitled to the Hakim Group Benefits package, including access to Simply Health, a cash-back and rewards card, cycle to work scheme and much much more.

About the Role

For us, this is what being a JVP Optometrist is all about:

  • Becoming a leader
  • Creating and nurturing innovation
  • Constant and never-ending improvement
  • Playing as a team
  • Communication, communication, communication

If you are enjoying yourself, learning, and your team is happy to come into work every day to deliver an exceptional patient experience – that, for us, is true success.

It’s not work if you love what you do, and it’s our job to make that happen!

What’s Next?

If you are interested in becoming a JVP with Hakim Group and being the Director of your dream practice – click apply below, and a member of our team will contact you with more information!

Salary – Max

GBP £55,000.00

Salary – Min

GBP £50,000.00

excerpt.rendered: What’s in it for you? The opportunity to own and run an already well established and successful private Optical practice.
